no worries,  first you need to cd to /dev and type ls to get a list of the files in there.  If you have only 1 cd-drive it should show up as a file named "cdrom" or something similar

Ok cool.  Now you need to make a file somewhere that is appropriate to mount he cd drive into.  The customary place is inside /media.  I suggest you "sudo mkdir /media/cd" or something similar.
